title: Untitled Goose Game Wins Big at D.I.C.E. - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.14.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Listen to The Besties free, only on Spotify.

To get your new wireless plan for just 15 bucks a month, and get the plan shipped to your door for FREE, go to http://mintmobile.com/games.

Blessing and Tim sit down to discuss the D.I.C.E. Awards, PS5 prices, and more.

00:03:38 - Housekeeping
SCREEN FAST is happening right after today’s episode of KFGD
Today around 2:30 we'll be streaming the closed beta of Bleeding Edge
Love, Sex, and Stuff RETURNS tonight at 8PM.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:43 - What the Honk is happening, we have our DICE Awards Winners
00:08:25 - “What does this win mean for the future of indie games?” - Frankfurtter
00:18:03 - Sony Is Struggling With PlayStation 5 Price Due to Costly Parts
00:33:26 - “Is this a worrying sign for release day prices?” - The Nano Biologist
00:36:24 - Half Life: Alyx has a Release Date
00:37:55 - January NPD is in and spending is down
00:41:37 - “Am I crazy for thinking there’s a chance GTA gets re-rereleased on next gen consoles?” - Dhcanada
00:47:51 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:09 - “Are we seeing a turn for video game movies?” - The Nano Biologist
01:01:21 - “Is there a growing trend for shorter date announcements to release periods for big games?” - A Qwerk of Fate
01:06:30 - Squad Up: Sid - Epic Games Store - ssplayer
01:07:01 - You‘re Wrong
01:10:20 - Post Show
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Blessing & Tim
Tuesday - Blessing & Imran
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Blessing & Tim
Friday - Greg & Blessing
